title: My Art Isn't Doing the Trick - Part 2
description:
After taking Dr. Laura's advice to enjoy the process of being creative, Ashley says she has been less critical and happier while taking time for herself. Dr. Laura: "Squeeze as much joy from life as possible."

Do you feel guilty taking time for yourself? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
